org.aludratest.service.file
Class File

java.lang.Object
  org.aludratest.service.file.File
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionWordLibrary<File>
public class File
extends Object
implements ActionWordLibrary<File>

Represents a file in a file system, provided by a FileService.

Author:
Volker Bergmann
